doc.field: New York State National Guard, 51st Cavalry Brigade payroll record
New York State National Guard, 51st Cavalry Brigade payroll record
Payroll record of the New York State National Guard 51st Cavalry Brigade for the period August 1 to September 30, 1940.
Payroll record of the New York State National Guard 51st Cavalry Brigade for the period August 1 to September 30, 1940.
Payroll record of the New York State National Guard 51st Cavalry Brigade for the period August 1 to September 30, 1940.
The New York State National Guard 51st Cavalry Brigade was organized circa 1920 and held its headquarters at an armory on Staten Island formerly known as Manor Farm.
Source and date of acquisition unknown. Formally accessioned in 1977.
